inn1.comm: short of a length, on the pads, Tamim looks to work this to leg, but the ball hardly comes on, and takes a soft leading edge
big shout for lbw as Tamim plays across the line and the ball pitches leg and straightens. Hits him on the line of leg, and would have possibly missed leg stump
short of a length, on the pads, tucked away, but doesn't find the gap on the leg side
fuller, middle and leg, not much movement, defended to leg
full on the pads, bunted to the legside
short of a length, middle and off, defended to off to end a maiden
full, on off, defended back to him by Anamul
short of a length, on off, hits the inside half of the bat as he defends
short of a length, slight shape away after pitching off, defended with an open face
full outswinger, not too wide, but called anyway. Pitches within the white line and really full but it swings away to be wided
on a length, just outside off, defended with an open face
on a length, on off, straightens a touch, defended to cover
first run off the bat as Anamul steers this shortish delivery to third man
nice delivery. Short of a length, just outside off, but then it holds its line and beats Anamul who plays for the angle
on a length, on off, defended to cover
first proper shot with run-scoring intent. Punched away in front of cover, but Rayudu's dive at short extra cover denies them runs
short of a length, outside off, stays a touch low, takes the inside edge and bounces over the stumps
short of a length, angling in, dropped into the leg side for one
on a length, pretty accurate, another soft leading edge as Tamim looks to work this to leg
extra bounce as Yadav bangs this in short of a length. Anamul looks to punch, but is beaten by the bounce
straightens outside off, bunted into the leg side for a single
short of a length, middle and off, punched to cover
full and wide, Tamim almost edges it as he follows it. Not called wide this time even though this outside the white line
bouncer, middle4 and leg, just outside leg. Wide for the height
short of a length, outside off, Tamim looks for the expansive drive, is beaten by the angle

first wicket of the series. Tamim's edgy innings ends. He is squared up by this shortish delivery that angles across him. Seems to have kissed the outside edge on the way. Well actually it hasn't. The bat hit the pad at the same time as the ball passed the bat, creating the misleading noise. Tamim has had a rough one here
on a length, outside off, defended
throws his arms at it, gets a thick outside edge, but the third man is square and is beaten on his left
on a length, outside off, defended to mid-off
short of a length, into the pads, defended to leg
nice shot. Leans across and forward to reach a widish length ball, and push-drives it between extra cover and cover
slight seam movement. Anamul is looking to drive at one again, he sees it come back in from outside off, and aborts the shot. The ball nearly takes the inside edge as he defends
on a length, on off, angling away, left alone
short of a length, at the stumps, hits the inside edge on its way to the pad
short of a length, middle and leg, hits him high on the pad as he looks to work this to leg
looks to cut as this one seems a touch wide, but it is not short enough, and is beaten by some extra bounce
wide down the leg side. Pitched outside leg and there is no movement
short of a length, just outside off, pushed to cover
fuller, just outside off, pushed with soft hands. Gets a single wide of mid-off
length ball, outside off, angling in, defended to mid-on
short of a length, angling in, pushed to cover
digs this in short but the ball doesn't come up really, and is pulled away for a couple
short of a length, angling in, worked away wide of midwicket
gentle full ball outside off, defended to cover
on a length, outside off, left alone
on a length, middle and leg, no turn, defended to leg
tossed up outside off, he leaves the crease to push this wide of mid-off for a single
fuller, flatter, outside off, defended with an open face
flatter, on off, pushed to cover
slightly shorter, punched away, but can't beat cover
punches a flat delivery again, but this time he finds the gap between short cover and extra cover. The outfield, unlike the pitch, is lightning quick
wide half-volley, driven hard, but straight to cover
extra bounce on this shortish delivery, and beats the outside edge
full, swinging in, beats the inside edge, hits the pad
short of a length, wide, he pushes it softly to cover. Doesn't seem to prefer the cut
fuller, slightly slower, almost a half-volley, and Anamul has crashed this back over Yadav who can't get a touch to it
dropped by the India captain. Instinctively Anamul opens his face to a shortish delivery outside off, gets a healthy edge, but Raina spills it overhead at first slip. A simple catch really
bunted into the leg side for one
defended off the front foot
flatter, low-arm this time, defended to cover
another flat ball, pushed to cover again
tossed up now, driven to long-off for one
full and straight, holds its line, takes a massive leading edge as Anamul is opened up playing towards midwicket. Gets a single to deep point
Mominul never looked in. He is out now. On a length, angling away, and a lazy loose drive from Mominul. Feet stuck, bat speed slow, playing away from the body, and a soft edge through to Saha
short of a length, pretty straight, defended back to him
stays short of a length and accurate. Defended to cover
fuller, on off, defended back to him
tucked away off the hip to get off the mark
on a length, outside off, defended to cover
flatter, shorter, defended to leg. Anamul wants a single, but is sent back because it has gone straight to midwicket
fuller outside off, defended to cover
driven down to long-off for a single
flatter, middle and off, angling in, defended to cover
fired in again, played straight to midwicket
flighted generously, middle and leg, driven to long-off for one
nice loopy legbreak, middle and leg, defended with soft hands
another slow legbreak, pushed with soft hands, wide of cover, takes a single
another nice legbreak, pitched outside leg, turning towards middle and off, worked away to leg for one
quicker one, this doesn't turn, beats the inside edge and hits the pad
slows it down again, gets appreciable turn, defended from the crease
flat delivery, quick, into the pads, Mushfiq gets a touch on it, enough to beat short fine leg
slows it down, defended off the front foot
middle and leg, flat, no turn, defended off the front foot
flighted outside off, driven wide of long-off for two. Mohit has an ice neckerchief on as he fields
flighted this time, no turn, defended back to him
another tossed-up delivery, too full, driven to long-on
some drift in, pitches middle and leg, turns towards off, defended back to him
swept away hard, gets a single to deep square leg
half-volley, on off, driven to long-off for one
nice dip and drift on this, Anamul is not to the pitch of it, and has to defend this legbreak
this is short, and slow, and Mushfiq goes back to work this for an easy single
flighted on off, defended off the front foot
flat, angling in, defended to leg
intent this time. Mushfiq dances down the wicket, makes sure he is not very close to the pitch of the ball, has the room to swing, and drives this over extra cover for a six. Lovely inside-out shot
shorter, darted in, defended to leg
short of a length, on off, defended with an open face
looks to late-cut this from off, gets the touch on it, but can't beat short third man
drops this with soft hands, gets a single in the covers
short of a length, on off, punched away nicely, but can't beat cover
short, Mushfiq pulls it nicely, wide of deep square leg, gets a couple
slog-sweeps this time. Mushfiq is making this game interesting. Over midwicket it goes. Gets four for that
flatter this time. Not too short, and defended to leg
flatter, angling in, defended to leg
tossed up on off, defended with an open face
short of a length, pushed down to long-on for an easy single
stays short of a length, defended with an open face
pushed into the pads, worked away for an easy single
on a length, just outside off, defended back to him
quickish on off, pushed straight to point
another quick and short delivery. Anamul pulls, doesn't get all of it, but it falls safely over midwicket and brings him a couple
short outside off, punched away to sweeper-cover
short of a length, punched down to long-on
flighted outside off, defended to cover
short of a length, some turn, pushed to cover for one
mid-off is up, and Anamul shows great awareness by stepping out and lobbing him over the man at mid-off
flat, length ball, defended to leg
tossed up on off, driven to long-off for one
on a length, dips on him, defended to cover
googly, tossed up outside off, Anamul hasn't picked it, but gets a single off the inside edge
drives a tossed-up delivery, but can't beat cover inside the circle
nicely tossed up just outside off, defended off the front foot
stays back for a length ball, punches it back to the bowler
short, flat, pulled down towards long-on for one
slightly fuller this time, bunted to leg for one
looks to late-cut this, but is beaten by the extra pace on this
on a length, on off, defended to leg
premeditates to change the stance pretty early. He has switched the stance well before Rasool gets into his stance. And then reverse-sweeps it with crunchy timing over point
wide down the leg side
tossed up on the pads, worked away for a single
length ball, on off, defended to cover
short of a length, on off, punched past point for one
slow legbreak, on off, defended off the front foot
swept away hard to deep square leg for one
flighted wide, driven to long-off for one
quicker, shorter, punched back to him

Rasool's first international wicket. Anamul throws it away after setting the innings up. Jumps at rasool, not quite to the pitch of the ball, and still goes ahead with the shot. The mis-hit carries low to Rayudu at deep midwicket
flat outside off, defended to cover
into the pads, defended with soft hands
short of a length, on off, pushed wide of cover for a quick single
short of a length, middle and leg, pushed to midwicket
short and flat again, bunted for a single into the leg side
flat legbreak, picked away into the leg side for one
flat just outside off, defended with an open face
flighted on middle and leg, driven to long-on for one
flat, into the pads, worked away for one
half-volley, on off, driven to long-on for one
superb slog sweep. What crunchy sound as he connects. Clear over deep midwicket for a handsome six
angled into the pads of the left-hand batsman from round the wicket, turned behind square for a single to bring up the 100
tossed up from over the wicket, driven on the front foot to long off
pushed off the front foot to long off again
Mushfiqur slogs successfully again, getting down on one knee and hitting the ball into the gap on the midwicket boundary
nudged off the pads towards square leg
stays in his crease and drives the ball in front of point
angles this in towards middle, didn't really come on. Shakib waits and tucks it towards midwicket
angles this towards off now, back of a length, and Shakib punches it out to deep cover
another slower ball, on off stump, and he's waited on the back foot to dab it towards third man
that's full, on off stump, and Shakib goes hard at it, playing slightly across it. Doesn't really get hold of it and it rolls down to long-on
slower-ish ball, full and outside off, and he slices this drive out to deep point
length ball on off stump, and he drives it down to long-on
tossed up on off stump, and he drives this carefully back to the bowler
turn from outside leg, and Shakib closes his face a touch early and gets a leading edge that trickles towards short third man
onto the pads, and he tucks it away to deep backward square leg to bring up his 15th half-century
angled in, back of a length, and he makes room to punch it to deep point
full, on the pads, and he drives wristily to long-on
short, a bit of width, and he slaps it to deep point
angled in towards middle, makes himself room and pokes it into the covers
waits a touch longer on this ball, and there's a touch more turn, so he opens his bat face and runs it down to short third man
quick and flat, and he pushes it out carefully into the covers
this is a nice line he's bowling. No room whatsoever. Punched into the covers again
slightly slower this time, and he has the time to hit it a touch harder and place this to the left of cover, down to long-off
fullish, on off stump, and he miscues this slog-sweep but it drops just short of short midwicket
down the pitch, and doesn't quite get hold of it. Hits slightly across the line towards midwicket
flatter and quicker this time, and he defends into the off side
a touch slower, and he comes forward and drives punchily to mid-off
sees the tossed-up delivery and immediately clears his front leg to swing the bat cleanly across it and send it soaring over the deep midwicket boundary
full, on off stump, and he's bowled this much quicker. Comes forward to defend to cover
a touch short, but it doesn't quite come on. Shapes to cut and plays a touch early to hit it to mid-off
onto the pads this time, and he tucks it down to deep backward square leg
that tight angle again, in towards middle and off, makes room but can't get that punch past cover
down the track now and driven towards long-on
a touch short and he rocks back but Rayudu dives to his right and makes a good save to stop that cut
tossed up, and he is down on his knee in an instant to launch that over cow corner
quicker again, and he pushes it down to long-on off the back foot

Rasool has another wicket. Mushfiq looks to target Rasool again, but this time he is not close to the potch of the ball even though he has stepped outside the crease. Gets a massive edge on this, and Rahane completes a safe catch in the mid-off area
goes back to late-cut a flat length ball, to the right of deep point
short of a length, angling in, pushed wide of cover for one
tossed up outside off, defended off the front foot
short of a length, angling in, worked away for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, bunted into the leg side for one
short, pulled to long-on for one
on a length, middle and leg, worked away for a single
short, wide, fails to time the cut
gets a thick edge on this cut, but luckily for him it goes between backward point and short third man
short of a length, middle and leg, punched to straight midwicket for one
punched away to point, but doesn't get a run
flighted outside off, defended to point
flat, short and wide, and has been crashed inn front of the diving man at point. Superb shot
on a length, on off, gets a leading edge as he looks to work this to leg. Safe
short, on off, turning in, pushed to straight midwicket
flat again, on off, worked into the leg side for one
short of a length, angling in, dabbed to off
slow, flighted, just outside off, defended off the front foot
full, on off, driven to long-on for one
on a length, on off, driven to long-off for one
this is flatter, doesn't turn, is pretty straight, and is played straight back to him
angling into the pads, helped away for a single
tossed up, on off, pushed back to him
short of a length, on off, defended
flighted on off, defended to midwicket
short of a length, angling in, worked to leg
lovely shot. Down the wicket, right to the pitch of the ball, and drives it back over Rasool's head for four
flatter, on off, dabbed away to point
down the wicket to drive this to long-on for one
short of a length, angling in, punched down the ground, but finds mid-on
poor delivery with fine leg up. Nicely nudged away fine of short fine for four
length ball angling in, gets an inside edge onto the pad for a single
on a length, slower ball, pretty accurate, defended to leg
on a length, on off, seems the slower ball again, is hit on the inside half of the bat
gathers his breath and runs in for another delivery. On a length, just outside off, played straight to mid-off
short of a length, on off, pushed to cover off the back foot
wide down the leg side
poor stuff. After that leg-side wide, he provides another freebie there with the fine leg up. Tickled away for four
length ball outside off, pushed to long-on for one
wide length ball, driven on the up, but can't beat extra cover
mis-hits the pull as this cramps him up a little. The substitute Tiwary goes flying at midwicket but can't reach it
on a length, angling in, defended to mid-on
drags this short, but Shakib mis-times the pull for a single to deep midwicket
swept away to deep square leg
pulled away to deep square leg for another single
stays back to push this length ball wide of cover for one
quick and flat. Shakib pushes this with soft hands for a single to cover
darted into the pads as Mahmud looks to make room. Cramps him up into playing a defensive shot
short, wide, cut away, but Rahane at backward point saves three with a dive
upper-cuts him for a four. Makes room and knows he is going to go after this one. Opens the face of the bat, crashes this short ball over point and to the right of third man
big wide down the leg side
short of a length, outside off, drops it into the off side
full, on off, pushed to cover
short of a length, outside off, defended to cover
length ball, on off, and he defends this too. Three nothing shots after that four
short and wide, and Shakib goes back to cut and beat the short third man. Partnership reaches fifty
short of a length, on the pads, bunted to leg for a single
darted into the pads, hits the pad
presses forward to take this on the full, and sweeps this to the left of short fine leg
makes room but Patel follows him, and he has to defend this back
down the wicket but not to the pitch of the ball, and mis-hits this to midwicket
Shakib tries the big slog-weep, gets a think inside edge onto the pad for a single
down the wicket, reaches too close to the pitch of the ball, and hits it back to the bowler
flat, into the pads, tucked away to short fine
swept away to deep square for one
down the wicket, cramped by the angle, mis-hits this to long-on for one
gives him the charge again, and this time the connection is sweet. Long-on has only a few steps top move to his left, but can't keep this in

Coolly Raina takes the big wicket of Shakib. The batsman wants to pull this shortish delivery, but it stops on him, and he ends up hitting this straight back at Raina which catches it with fingers pointing skywards
short, flat, cut away, but can't beat cover
short and wide again, cut away straight to the fielder in the circle again
cramps him up with a delivery angled into the pads
tossed up, driven to long-on for a single
too far down the leg side, Mahmud gets enough bat on it to beat short fine leg
flighted, middle and leg, turning towards off, defended back to him
quicker, flatter, played back to him
Mishra tosses this up, Nasir looks for the slog-sweep, is nowhere near the ball and is beaten
charges at him, drives this to long-on for one
short of a length, into the pads, pushed wide of long-on for a couple
flat legbreak on the pads, pushed away between long-on and deep midwicket for another couple
down the wicket, Akshar fires this in, pushed to midwicket
down the wicket, gets a thick outside edge over cover angling into the pads, worked away for a single
down the wicket, gets a thick outside edge over cover angling into the pads, worked away for a single
down the wicket, lovely chip shot over cover for four
charges at him, takes it on the half-volley, gets a single to long-off
slog-sweep from around the leg-stump line. not a powerful hit, but he has managed to play this to the right of midwicket in the circle. India's fielding in this heat is not looking very energetic
googly, but it is too full, and Hossain sweeps this square over the fielder in the circle
slow slow legbreak, looks to sweep, and is beaten
fired into the pads, worked to leg for one
Mishra gets his own back. His flatter legbreak that doesn't turn much. Just enough top beat the defensive bat of Mahmudullah, and pegs back the off stump
full, middle and leg, worked to leg for one
short of a length, into the pads, with fine leg up, but this time Zia fails to make contact and gets just a leg-bye
watches him make room, follows him with a full ball, concedes just the single
on a length, into the pads, chipped over midwicket for two

superb catch by Raina. Zia tries to go over mid-off, mis-hits this completely, Raina runs in from straight extra cover, puts in the dive, and gets his right hand under it inches before it touches the ground
big wide from Yadav. he has bowled quite a few down the leg side today
wide length ball, pushed to cover

another wicket falls. Bangladesh falling apart here. This is tossed up wide outside off, Hossain is shaping up to slog-sweep, but the width makes him go into the off side. No control over the shot. Caught at long-off
wide outside the leg side. India appeal for both the catch and the stumping. Neither is upheld. This is fired there. No touch from the bat. Keeper not interested, only the bowler
driven to long-off for one
short of a length, middle and leg, worked to leg for one
flighted on middle and leg, slogged away between deep midwicket and long-on
driven to long-on for one
tight run. Drops this towards point and runs. Mortaza stumbles while running, but just about makes it. A driect hit would have got him
drives this length ball on the up, but hits it straight to mid-off
what a slow. Slower ball, he is on a knee, but gives it a heavy thump. Beats mid-off to his right
chips this length ball over cover for a single
lovely shot. Wide length ball, he moves across, drives this on the up, beats extra cover to his right, and deep cover to his left
short of a length, on off, bunts this for a single
too straight with fine leg up, and he has drop-kicked it over that man for four. Too full and too straight
short, flat, on the pads, worked away for a single
huge six. Lovely sweep shot. Moves inside the line of this ball, which is quick and flat, and uses the pace of the bowler to send it over square leg
slows it down, Mortaza wants a slog, but gets only a single off the inside half of the bat
short, looks to pull, mis-hits it to midwicket for a single
Patel's first international wicket. Mortaza goes back to make room to hit this over extra cover. is beaten by it, and the off stump is pegged back
short of a length, outside off, he keeps it out, hands over the strike to Razzak
tossed up bravely, ends up being a yorker, dug out for a single
full, middle and leg, driven to long-on for one
flat, on the pads, misses out on an opportunity with the fine leg up. Hits this straight to the man
outside leg again, but this is slower, higher and the googly, and beats him
driven this between long-on and deep midwicket, and comes back to take the4 strike for the last ball
full and flat on the pads, and Razzak misses out on this too. Has to make do with just a leg-bye

inn2.comm: and Uthappa is away. Short of a length, wide, pushed wide of backward point, and comes back for an easy couple
widish length ball, Uthappa follows it, is beaten by the straightening of its line
wide length ball, left alone again
beautiful delivery. Mortaza goes wide on the crease, Uthappa plays for the angle, and then it leaves him after pitching. Beats him
short of a length, angling in, he gets inside the line to work it away for a couple
on a length, on off, angling in, defended off the front foot
gets swing, but too far down the leg side, and is wided
short of a length, angling in, worked away nicely for another couple, left enough of fine leg
short and wide, nicely cut away, but finds backward point
on a length, just outside off, seams in a little, makes him play the forward defensive
huge lbw appeal as this inswinger beats Rahane 's inside edge and hits him in front of off, but this is bowled from wide on the crease, and could have saved Rahane
short of a length, angling in, defended off the back foot
wide length ball, runs off the outside edge for a single. Soft hands at play
on a length, just outside off, moving in, defended off the front foot
tries the drive on the front foot, but can't get the timing on this. Hit straight to mid-off
short of a length, angling in, clipped away to long leg for one
moves forward to defend s short-of-a-length delivery
bowls the outswinger this time, Uthappa moves forward, and then lets it be
short of a length, outside off, Uthappa presses forward to defend this to cover
full, angling in, pushed to mid-on for a quick single
nice touch. Wide on the crease, angling in, Uthappa opens the face late, guides wide of the only slip and fine of third man
opens the face again, but this time he is done in by the holding of its line. Beaten
short of a length, angling in, defended to leg
lovely shot. Uthappa gets his forward press going, meets this on the up, and drives it between the bowler and mid-on
bouncer, too short and too high, and is called a wide
full, driven down the ground again, but straight to mid-off
short of a length, outside off, punched to cover
walks down the wicket, punches this crisply again, but can't beat extra cover
down the wicket again, gets under a wide length ball, and smacks it over mid-on. Not al elegant stroke, but effective nonetheless
short of a length, angling in, worked away for a single
wide on the crease, gets good inward movement, finds the thick inside edge, which goes for a single
nearly a run-out. Slower ball, pushed towards mid-on, Rahane sets off, but it is Uthappa's call, and he doesn't want the run. Rahane makes it safely after being sent back
risky single again, pushed to mid-off, just to his left, and they make it this time too
on a length, angling in, Rahane stays back to defend
ungainly shot. Rahane looks to drag this widish delivery to leg, and is lucky to not have edged it
on a length, outside off, pushed to cover
short of a length, angling in, whipped away to square leg for two
slower ball, Rahane fails to keep this clip down, but it goes safely through square leg
Rahane dances down the wicket, and it doesn't matted this is a slower ball, he has driven it over extra cover for a sweet six
strays onto the pads, worked away past square leg for two
good sharp bouncer, Rahane has to pull out of the pull. Aimed at his head, and coming in with the angle to cramp him up
this is a softer short ball, only chest high, and Rahane pulls it over midwicket for an easy four
short of a length, wide, punched away to cover
another good-looking punch shot outside off, but finds the man at cover again
on a length, angling in, defended off the front foot
he has hit him like a spinner. Charges at him, and clobbers him through mid-off for four
on a length, angling in, moves forward to open the face for a single to third man
pulled away from chest high, gets a single to deep square leg
driven on the up, but straight to mid-off
and here's the deft touch to go with the bludgeon earlier in the over. Opens the face late on this, places it fine of third man, and comes back for the second
full, on the pads, Shakib gets away with it as he finds short fine leg with the sweep
on a length, just outside off, turns away a touch, defended off the front foot
full, on off, hits the inside half of the bat as Rahane defends
stays back to a length ball, punches this to cover
low full toss, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
full, on the pads, clipped to short midwicket
looks to cut, gets a thick edge, wide of point, Rahane comes back for a couple
punched down to long-off for one
full, middle and leg, pushed to mid-on
down the wicket, gets under a length ball, and he has only just clipped it off his toes, but this has carried all the way for a six over cow corner. Smooth as
quicker, flatter, on off, defended back to him
slower in the air, dips on him in front of off, defended off the front foot
length ball, outside off, defended to cover
pushes this with soft hands, wide of cover, for a single
flighted outside off, driven to long-off for one
arm ball, moves in with the angle, defended off the back foot
slower in the air, middle and leg, gets some dip and drift, defended back to him
down the wicket to take this on the half-volley, and drives it to long-off for one
short of a length, punched down to long-on for one
short of a length, outside off, punched away to deep cover for one
another punch off the back foot, another single to deep cover
goes back to cut this length ball, another single for India
wide full ball, driven to deep cover again
wide down the leg side
slow, shortish, punched away for another single
cut away to deep cover for one
down the wicket to drive this to long-on for one
flighted high, slower, Uthappa has to defend off the front foot
lovely shot. Just a nonchalant chip. No violence, no power. Just lobs this towards long-off, and it carries all the way
pushed to cover as he fires this in
tossed up high, defended off the front foot
full, on off, defended back to him
arm ball, follows him as he goes back, and Rahane recovers to punch it down to long-on for one
flighted on off, driven back at Razzak who gets a bad bounce to allow him the single
goes wide on the crease, angles this in, hits the inside half of the bat
super shot. A loose ball, too short, and he has punched this through midwicket for four
full and outside leg with the fine leg up. A really poor delivery. Swept away wide of that short fine leg
short of a length, into the pads, worked away for a single
tossed up outside off, defended off the front foot
full, on the pads, worked away for a single
half-volley on off, driven to long-on for one
tossed up outside off, pushed to cover
flighted around off, slow in the air, defended to cover
on a length, outside off, pushed to mid-off
too short for that pace. Uthappa is already smiling even before he middles this for a six over midwicket
short of a length, just outside off, pushed back to him
short of a length, outside off, punched wide of deep cover
clipped away to long-on for a single that brings up the fifty. Uthappa's golden touch continues. Looks up at the skies and thanks whoever is up there
on a length, just outside off, defended off the front foot
given out lbw but Uthappa half-shows him the bat, and rightly so. This is angled in from Shakib, but Uthappa has got a huge inside edge onto the pad. He has to go, though
tossed up on off, defended back to him
slow through the air, angling in, defended off the front foot
fired down the leg side for a wide
sharp turn as Shakib slows this one down, and he beats the outside edge
superb delivery first up. Slow in the air, pitches off, turns against the angle, beats the outside edge, hits the pad. Would have missed off

was an exactly similar delivery but this time Pujara has been given. This seems to be a direct result of the pressure from the previous delivery. This is even higher than the previous one. Can't see how that can be given. Great delivery but this is sailing over the stumps. Pujara's second duck in two innings
short of a length, outside off, cut to point
driven down to long-off for a single
what sharp turn. Rayudu is lucky to have survived. This turns from middle and leg, takes a thick outside edge, and there is no way Mushfiqur can take this. Too thick an edge
lovely arm ball, nearly gets the lbw, but the inside edge saves Rayudu
charges him this time, gets a single to deep cover

panic-stricken calling. Rahane has hit this to the left of point, Rayudu wants the single (and it is his call) but Rahane raises his arm like a traffic cop. He finally get s a single as the fielder's dive is not enough
sharp turn again. What has happened to the pitch under the covers? Missing the leg stump, though
more sharp turn, but this is a wide down leg
this time Rayudu doesn't trust Rahane's call. Hit softly to mid-off, but Rayudu takes an age to respond. They make it, though
dabs this to short third man
huge lbw appeal but also a highly optimistic one. Turning too much and takes an inside edge too
more turn but this starts from around off and is a wide down leg
half an appeal for a catch as Rayudu looks to cut but the ball doesn't turn as match as expected. Beaten on the outside edge
pushed wide of point for a single
short of a length, played with soft hands, gets a single to point
fired down the leg side, called a wide
short of a length, on off, defended to leg
on a length, middle and leg, goes off the inside half for a single
flat on off, pushed straight to cover, but they steal a single
slower through the air, pretty accurate, defended to leg
driven down to long-off for one
swept away from middle and leg for a single to square leg
flat offbreak but down leg and called a wide
lovely shot. Down the wicket, right to its pitch, and drives this between mid-off and extra cover
short of a length, turning in, bunts it for a single to cover
nearly a run-out. Rayudu hares up the wicket, but the ball has gone straight to mid-on. A slow throw from Nasir saves Rayudu. Mahmudullah is frustrated
down the wicket to beautifully chip this inside-out over extra cover
short of a length, turning in, worked around the corner for one
on a length, middle and leg, defended
too short, the rare loose ball from Shakib, and Rahane goes back to pull this over midwicket for a six
flighted outside off, driven to deep extra cover for one
beaten in the flight as he looks to step out. Pushes in front of the body to defend
this might be the game sealed. Too short as Shakib looks for the arm ball, and Rayudu pulls this wide of mid-on for four more
short of a length, slow, pushed to cover

there is life in this dog yet. Ziaur Rahamn, who was rather slow in diving a ball ago, flies at short third man to send Rahane back. Slower ball from Mortaza, Rahane drives, looking to go over extra, but gets a thick edge, and Zia takes it overhead when the ball has almost passed him
on a length, on off, pushed to mid-off for one
short of a length, into the pads, worked to leg for one
short, wide, pushed straight to cover
short of a length, just outside leg, angling towards off, and he is hit high on the pad. The ball has gone nowhere, but Rayudu still wants a leg-bye. Crazy runner he is
short of a length, pitched outside leg, defended back to Mortaza
on a length, outside off, driven past point for a single
Raina gets lucky. Short ball, on off, he pulls, gets a bottom edge that beats the stumps and the keeper
on a length, middle and leg, defended to midwicket
on a length, middle and leg, defended to midwicket
low full toss, he is down the wicket, pushes this wide of extra cover, and gets a single because of Anamul's dive
slower ball, short of a length, and Rayudu sets off again when there is no single available and it is Raina's call. Hit straight to point
arm ball, on off, punched wide of the man at point for a single
turning down leg, Mushfiqur appeals for a catch. He doesn't get the call, but it is not called a wide either
driven down to long-on for a single
Raina does it coolly. Down the wicket, under the ball, drives this wide of long-off for four
India win. Short of a length, just outside off, he makes room and cuts this past point to seal off the chase
